name: Boo! - A Ghost Story
description:
"Hello Mister!
I see you've come across my home."

"What's that? You're looking for someone?
What a coincidence, I am waiting for someone right now~!"

"Well~ while we wait and look,
Would you like to play together with me~?"

"Boo! - A Ghost Story" 

This is a short story game I developed in 14 days for the Black & White (B&W) Game Jam hosted by Lone Rabbit. Explore and uncover the truth behind this old and broken house you once knew. The game is purely fictional and any resemblance to real-life events is unintended.

Controls 

Arrow keys - Move around, Navigate title & menu screen
Z or Enter - Interact, Accept, Add letter (Naming)
X or Esc - Cancel, Delete letter (Naming)
Controls can be changed in options

My first game in RPG Maker.

The game was developed in RPG Maker MV 1.6.2.  Arts, visual design, and presentation were done by me, JouleHuece. The coding in RPG Maker MV was also executed by me.  However, the music, sound design, and RPG Maker MV plugins were produced and developed (Only handpicked by me) by the following:
